title: Eco Studio Retreat in Leafy Koscielisko
description: Discover this stylish and compact studio in the tranquil neighborhood of Koscielisko. With a thoughtfully designed 28 sqm layout, this apartment combines functional elegance with sustainable living. Hardwood floors and energy-efficient windows shape a modern yet cozy atmosphere, while the ground-floor entrance provides wheelchair accessibility. Enjoy the luxury of a heated driveway and tot up in the cozy residents' lounge after a day in the Tatra Mountains.
neighborhood_description: Koscielisko is a growing neighborhood proud of its lush, green surroundings and mountain air, yet conveniently close to Zakopane’s vibrant center. Residents enjoy a peaceful, community-oriented lifestyle with easy reach to hiking trails and local artisan shops. Excellent highway access makes both commuting and weekend getaways simple and stress-free.
lifestyle_benefits: eco-friendly design reduces utility cost and carbon footprint
quiet and scenic surroundings ideal for remote work or creative pursuits
access to nature trails and outdoor activities
strong sense of community in an up-and-coming neighborhood
target_buyer: Ideal for young professionals or eco-conscious urbanites searching for a convenient year-round escape or starter home near nature.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity in Zakopane’s property market—perfect for sustainability-minded buyers seeking affordability, modern amenities, and exceptional access to outdoor beauty.
